alert.note: Alert for Coastal York; Interior York (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 2:33AM EST until January 16 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 6 inches, sleet accumulations up to one tenth of an inch, and ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Maine and central and southern New Hampshire. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to 10 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...An area of low pressure will bring a period of wintry precipitation to the region and could result in slick travel to the morning and evening commutes. Periods of moderate to heavy snow are possible in the afternoon and evening. The greatest potential for mixed precipitation will be along the coast this afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
